item.title: Understanding Servlet Mappings
item.description:
Servlet Mappings Made Simple: A Beginner’s Guide

Servlet mappings are a fundamental concept in Java web development. They define how requests from a web browser are directed to specific servlets on a server. Think of servlet mappings as traffic signs on a highwayâ€”they guide incoming requests to the right destination for processing.
